```{r}
library(tidyverse)
#BiocManager::install("AnnotationHub","ensembldb")
library(AnnotationHub)
library(ensembldb)
```

```{r}
ah <- AnnotationHub::AnnotationHub()
ahDb <- AnnotationHub::query(ah,
                             pattern = c("Saccharomyces cerevisiae",
                                         "EnsDb","107"))
ahEdb <- ahDb[[1]]
tx <- ensembldb::transcripts(ahEdb,return.type="DataFrame") %>%
  as_tibble
tx2gene <- tx %>% dplyr::select(tx_id_version,gene_id) %>%
  dplyr::rename("TXNAME"="tx_id_version","GENEID"="gene_id")
write_csv(tx2gene,"output/EnsDb.Saccharomyces-cerevisiae.v107_tx2gene.csv")
gene_keys <- ensembldb::keys(ahEdb, keytype = "GENEID")
geneid2name <- ensembldb::select(ahEdb,gene_keys,columns=c("GENEID","GENENAME","TXBIOTYPE"))
write_csv(geneid2name,"output/EnsDb.Saccharomyces-cerevisiae.v107_geneid2name.csv")
```
